definition: to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Construct a universal relay model that the action boundary can be self-defined.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種通用的動作邊界可自定義的繼電器模型。

sentences.english: The circuit has three relays that switch the high-voltage input to the piezoelectric motors.
sentences.chinese: 電路有三個繼電器轉換壓電發動機的高壓輸入。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the transformation of hoist relay control circuit with PLC.
sentences.chinese: 介紹用PLC改造門座式起重機的繼電器控制電路。

sentences.english: It mainly focuses on analysis and determining method of zero sequence power direction relay.
sentences.chinese: 重點介紹零序功率方向繼電器的分析及判定方法。

sentences.english: The zero sequence directional relay is an important relay component for transmission line.
sentences.chinese: 零序功率方向繼電器是線路保護中的一個重要元件。

sentences.english: For relay, pin bending and 900 bend back can be added.
sentences.chinese: 繼電器可增加彎腳及彎回900功能。

sentences.english: A float operated switch in the relay is used to initiate an alarm signal.
sentences.chinese: 繼電器內的浮控開關發動報警信號。

sentences.english: K-type thermocouple, contactless switch relay, limit unit.
sentences.chinese: 型熱電偶，非接觸型繼電器開關，極限裝置。

sentences.english: More power is needed to actuate a relay than to maintain a given state.
sentences.chinese: 需要更大的功率才能夠觸動繼電器並維持給定的狀態。

sentences.english: An overload relay which based on PIC single-chip microcomputer was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了基於PIC單片機的過載繼電器。

sentences.english: Directional impedance relays (mho relays) are frequently used in high-voltage power systems.
sentences.chinese: 方向阻抗繼電器是高壓電力網中最常用的繼電器之一。

sentences.english: Directional impedance relays (mho relays) are frequently used in high-voltage power systems.
sentences.chinese: 方向阻抗繼電器是高壓電力網中最常用的繼電器之一。

sentences.english: Materials and physical configuration of relays determine inherent capacitances among their components.
sentences.chinese: 繼電器的材料和物理配置決定了其元件間的固有電容。

sentences.english: The conclusions can be used to guide the anti-vibration design of electromagnetic relay.
sentences.chinese: 該結論對電磁繼電器的抗振性設計具有指導意義。

sentences.english: The design is adapted for manufacturing various alternating current-direct current electromagnetic relays.
sentences.chinese: 該設計適用於製造各種交直流電磁繼電器。
